attributes.additional_details:
PETITION FOR THE SANCTIONING AND RETURN OF LEGAL BARE KNUCKLE BOXING

WE THE PEOPLE WOULD LIKE FOR THE SPORT OF BAREKNUCKLE BOXING TO BE LEAGALISED AND RECONISED AS A LIGITIMATE SPORT.

BAREKNUCKLE BOXING HAS BEEN PROVEN TO BE SAFER THAN GLOVED BOXING AND THEREFORE THE PEOPLE WOULD FAVOUR ITS RETURN AS A RECOGNISED AND SAFE SPORT, AND TO CONVINCE THIS GOVERNMENT THE BENEFITS AND STATISTICS THAT PROVE BKB IS SAFE AND CONTRIVED OF SOUND MEMBERS.
